name: John (Shanzhai, yurgio, LLlarsO)
description:
One day, John wakes up in an unfamilar room with no means to leave. Can you help them escape?

W/D or arrow left/right to move
space key to jump
e/q/x to take/use items

Just a heads up: Shortly after the deadline, we realized there is a major, game-breaking bug caused by a copy-paste-oversight in this game which can end you up having the same item twice and/or overwriting an item essential to finishing the game. It still is finishable, but it's pretty darn hard. So if you have the same item twice, chances are you already rendered the game unbeatable. We are deeply sorry and hope you'll give it another try after the rating period has ended.
